cast.name: 哈维尔·德彼得罗 Javier De Pietro
利桑德罗·罗德里格兹 Lisandro Rodríguez

introduction: Tosie is a teenager from an Asian family who lives and works growing flowers with her mother. One day, her mother becomes heavily depressed. Tosie is forced to handle the whole situation on her own so her self-discovery process is threatened. Despite all the setbacks, she manages to overcome these difficulties and embarks on a journey towards re-establishing communication with her social environment by the music.
